mapper.select: select am.*,amd.is_read isRead from inno72_alarm_msg am left join inno72_alarm_msg_detail amd on am.id=amd.alarm_msg_id and amd.check_user_id=#{checkUserId} inner join inno72_machine m on am.machine_code=m.machine_code inner join inno72_check_user_machine cum on m.id=cum.machine_id where cum.check_user_id=#{checkUserId} order by am.create_time desc,amd.is_read
select am.*,cum.check_user_id from inno72_alarm_msg am inner join inno72_machine m on am.machine_code=m.machine_code inner join inno72_check_user_machine cum on m.id=cum.machine_id

select count(*) from inno72_alarm_msg am inner join inno72_machine m on am.machine_code=m.machine_code inner join inno72_check_user_machine cum on m.id=cum.machine_id left join inno72_alarm_msg_detail amd on am.id=amd.alarm_msg_id and amd.check_user_id=#{checkUserId} where cum.check_user_id=#{checkUserId} and (amd.is_read is null or is_read=0)
